text: Another quick update - version `0.6.8` and onwards of `@HubSpot/cms-components` and `@HubSpot/cms-dev-server` include updates to fix `useId()` (<https://react.dev/reference/react/useId|React docs link>) consistency when using islands_._ While you can use this hook yourself, more likely this would fix issues with third party libraries that use it under the hood_._ Let us know if you have any questions!
